snippet.title: MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION - Code Fairy Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Universal Century 0079: Flowers bloom even in the flames of war. 

Explore an untold story of battle operation in MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM BATTLE OPERATION Code Fairy! Stay tuned for more information at our official page: http://spr.ly/6059JMfTF
